Articles.Content:
Hey guys, this is my first thread, so dont slaughter me.

I have KSP .22 and have some mods on it. Whenever I run it, it freezes when the loading bar is all full. i dont know if i have too many mods or something but please help.

Have you tried taking out some mods systematically? It could be a problem with the memory limit, or a problem with a specific mod. Either way it is almost certainly a problem with mods, especially if it worked prior to that.
Ill try it just vanilla? Maybe that will work? I hope so. and thatnks for responding. Also, where can i learn the tricks and trades of the forum?
I took off some mods and guess what? It works! Thanks to everyone who participated in this.
